cast.name: 卡罗拉·哈科拉 Carola Hakola

introduction: Episode Name: Alexandra KorvaSeason: 1Episode: 1Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Season premiere. Alexandra Korva, Allu to friends, plans the summer after graduating with best friend Taala. Then Allu's mother gets a phone call that changes everything.Episode Name: Torvenkylän BelleSeason: 1Episode: 2Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Allu arrives to the countryside to work. A deadly boring summer takes a turn when Allu is introduced to Kerttu, the local beauty.Episode Name: PökkelökehrääjäSeason: 1Episode: 3Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Allu and Kerttu's warming relationship meets resistance from Kerttu's mother. Svante suffers a stroke that brings the farm's work to a halt.Episode Name: SuvijuhlatSeason: 1Episode: 4Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Allu, Rutanen, Lahja and Svante travel to the Summer Services religious festival, to hear the word of the lord and drink some beer. Kerttu takes her budding romance with Allu into her own hands.Episode Name: Hienompia vieraitaSeason: 1Episode: 5Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Relatives come to visit the farm, and Rutanen has planned everything. As the youngsters party in an abandoned house, Allu and Kerttu's romance suddenly becomes the centerpiece.Episode Name: Liian viatonSeason: 1Episode: 6Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Allu tries to appease Kerttu by writing a letter, with advice from Svante. Rutanen is caught in the middle when tensions with the rest of the youngsters come to a boiling point.Episode Name: Parempi kuin muutSeason: 1Episode: 7Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: The farm's fateful moment arrives, and Allu can't do anything but watch from the side. A phone call from Helsinki sends Allu to look for Kerttu, to tell her the news.Episode Name: Kotiin ei voi palataSeason: 1Episode: 8Aired: 2021-06-20Episode Overview: Summer is coming to an end and Allu meets Taala again. Their friendship is not what it was. Allu finds out that Kerttu might be in Helsinki, and tries to make contact. Season finale.
